descriptionHtml:
Name: Angus
Category: Companions
Version: 1.2
Date: 2012/06/21

------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------

I was missing the Dwarf companion in Skyrim and so that I made Angus the Shorty.

Class: Combat Warrior 2H
Specialization: 2-handed weapons, Heavy Armor. 
Level: Calculated from 10 to 70.
Morality; Violence Against Enemits
Non marriable, sorry
Non-Essential  
Initial Weapon: Steel Battleaxe
Initial Armor: Iron Armor
------------------- [Location] ----------------------

Falkreath, The Deadmans Drink Inn
------------------- [Install] -----------------------
Copy and overwrite in Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the SNAngus.esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod


----------------------[Bugs]--------------------------------
The color contrast between face and body is possible. 





------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
You are welcome to modify or reuse,  just give me credit.



Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
